description: LLM model configuration for merchant name cleaning

notes.primary_model: Used for prompts 1 and 3 (extraction and validation). Best reasoning capabilities.
notes.secondary_model: Used for prompt 2 (location removal). Provides diversity for ensemble.
notes.use_multi_model: If false, only primary_model is used for all 3 prompts.

recommended_combinations.notes: Best overall - qwen excels at details, dolphin is fast at filtering
Both large models - excellent reasoning but slower
Lighter weight option - faster but slightly less accurate
